snippet: With just a weeks to go before the scheduled landing of the Curiosity rover on Mars, NASA is turning to YouTube, Twitter and other social networks to help build interest in the program.
abstract: With just a weeks to go before the scheduled landing of the Curiosity rover on Mars, NASA is turning to YouTube, Twitter and other social networks to help build interest in the program.

headline.main: Mars Curiosity Rover Generates Social-Media Buzz
